title: Greg Lambrecht, Founder Of Coravin
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Greg Lambrecht, founder of Coravin, a device for pouring wine without opening the bottle. Harris also speaks with Skip Bennett, founder of Island Creek Oysters.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Greg Lambrecht, founder of Coravin, a device for pouring wine without opening the bottle. Harris also speaks with Skip Bennett, founder of Island Creek Oysters.
